snippet: The sleek Glas collection from Energizer includes a task lamp with an energy-efficient LED light source that produces 42 lumens per watt, more than a typical incandescent bulb.
abstract: The sleek Glas collection from Energizer includes a task lamp with an energy-efficient LED light source that produces 42 lumens per watt, more than a typical incandescent bulb.

headline.main: A Desk Lamp That Keeps Going and Going
headline.print_headline: A Desk Lamp With a Light That Keeps Going and Going
